property.name: Rules
property.value: When you score Helium-3 Deposit, place up to 2 power counters on a card with at least 1 power counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It takes power to create power.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Subroutine] The Corp gain 1[Credits] or draws 1 card. [Subroutine] The Corp gain 1[Credits] or draws 1 card. [Subroutine] The Corp gain 1[Credits] or draws 1 card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Recycling the energy entering the system via a run is both responsible and economical.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Click]: Place 1 power counter on IT Department. Hosted power counter: Choose a rezzed piece of ice. That ice has +1 strength until the end of the turn for each power counter (including the one spent) on IT Department.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: [Click]: Place 1 power counter on IT Department.||Hosted power counter: Increase targeted ICE strength.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The Runner may spend [Click] to break any subroutine on Markus 1.0. [Subroutine] The Runner trashes 1 of his or her installed cards. [Subroutine] End the run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The forge must never run cold.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: [Subroutine] The Runner trashes 1 of his or her installed cards.||[Subroutine] End the run.

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: Growing Solutions

property.name: Rules
property.value: The trash cost of each card is increased by 1 for each facedown card in Archives.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Achieve the Impossible.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain 1[Credits] whenever you create a server.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A masterpiece of cloning and hardware technology, Jinteki created homo vacuo operae, commonly called "turtlebacks", to operate for long periods of time within a vacuum.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [Click]. Rez 1 piece of ice for each tag the Runner has, ignoring all costs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When the Runner encounters Troll, trace2 - if successful, the Runner must lose [Click] or end the run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You gotta pay the troll toll to get in.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Subroutine] Trace2 - If successful, give the Runner 1 tag. If your trace strength is 5 or greater, give the Runner 1 tag.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Virgo promised love, but offered only jealousy.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: [Subroutine] Trace2 - If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.||If your trace strength is going to be 5 or greater, give the Runner 1 tag.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to steal an agenda, the Runner must pay 2[Credits] for each advancement token on that agenda. Limit 1 per deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Subroutine] The Runner cannot make another run this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There drew he forth the brand Excalibur, And o'er him, drawing it, the winter moon, Brightening the skirts of a long cloud, ran forth And sparkled keen with frost against the hilt: For all the haft twinkled with diamonds sparks, Myriads of topaz-lights, and jacinth work Of subtlest jewellery. -Lord Tennyson

property.name: Instructions
property.value: ⏎ Stop the Runner from making another run this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Install only in a remote server. [Trash]: Trash all cards installed in or protecting this server and traceX - if successful, do 3 net damage. X is the number of cards trashed. Use this ability only during a run on this server.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on Incubator. [Click], [Trash]: Move all virus counters from Incubator to another installed virus program.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What terrors hatch in her dispossessed mind, waiting for their moment to be born? My money's on a double-helix rainbow with the head of a panda." -fakespeare

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever the Corp loses at least 1[Credits], gain 1[Credits]. Trash Ixodidae if the Corp purges virus counters.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Digs in deeper than its Alabama counterpart.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run on R&D. If successful, instead of accessing cards, you may search your stack for a program and install it, lowering the install cost by 3 for each piece of ice protecting R&D, and then take 1 tag. Shuffle your stack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw 1 card whenever the Corp rezzes a piece of ice.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All programs are connected. The data that runs through one runs through all." -Rielle "Kit" Peddler

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sage has +1 strength for each unused MU. 2[Credits]: Break code gate or barrier subroutine.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: δὶς ἐς τὸν αὐτὸν ποταμὸν οὐκ ἂν ἐμβαίης

property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run. During this run, the Corp must pay X[Credits] as an additional cost to rez the first unrezzed piece of ice approached.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sometimes it's helpful to remember that you're not the only one who loves money." -Gabriel Santiago

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain 1[Credits] whenever you jack out.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The datastream slipped away, and it felt like being born for a second time, in only you could remember the first. A rush of air fills the lungs to bursting, and you gasp it out, coughing and choking as the dim lights of the room shine with the brilliance of a thousand suns.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Place 3 power counters on Earthrise Hotel when it is installed. When there are no power counters left on Earthrise Hotel, trash it. When your turn begins, draw 2 cards and remove 1 power counter from Earthrise Hotel.
